data.title: 3878, Bronx, NY — Public Records Instantly
data.meta_description: Charles P Banga is a resident of NY. Lookup the home address and phone 7185483878 and other contact details for this person
data.text:
Alter Names

The same person can appear under different names in public records. Quite often, people use short versions of their name (i.e. Stevie vs. Stephen), sometimes they use their name’s international variations (Christian/Cristian). It is quite rare but still happens that a person can be found being listed under a completely different name.

Alter Name *Full NamePersons Count ?Share ? ChristopherChristopher Banga 11.39% DavidDavid Banga 41.06% MichaelMichael Banga10.99% CarolCarol Banga40.94%

* Other possible variations for this name: C, Chuck, Chas, Charlie, Charle, Charlese, Charlesa, Chris, Char, Chad, Charlotte, Charlene, Charley.

Last Name Possible Variations

Foreign surnames can be transliterated and even translated (e.g. Rock vs. Rocha). Sometimes names in public records are misspelled due to silly typos and OCR errors. For example, Firth could be listed as Farth. Make sure to check as many variants as possible.

Alter Last NameFull NamePersons Count ?Share ? BandaCharles Banda 814.95% SinghCharles Singh 2313.08% PaulCharles Paul5224.67% CrespoCharles Crespo114.67% SotoCharles Soto644.67% BiddleCharles Biddle1032.8% BantaCharles Banta502.8% BangsCharles Bangs182.8% RuizCharles Ruiz1202.8% BarkleyCharles Barkley1272.8% SalvatoreCharles Salvatore231.87% WoodfordCharles Woodford571.87% SommerCharles Sommer901.87% BushCharles Bush7821.87%

This surname is found in public records in various versions, some of which are Kaur, Kaur banga, Oto, Banaga, Gruiz, Kaur kaur, Vanta, Shahzad, Shadzad, Amrit, Zepeda banda

Check Facebook

Charles P Banga can be found on facebook https://www.facebook.com/search/top/?q=Charles+Banga&epa=SEARCH_BOX. If this link does not work for you, you can also use FB directory https://www.facebook.com/directory/people/. Note, Facebook may ask you to prove you're not a bot - just solve CAPTCHA.
